title: Change an Ad's Destination URL
description: A landing page URL has changed, and a manager needs to update a live ad to point to the new page.

tasks.description: Locate the specific ad that needs to be updated.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct ad within the campaign.

tasks.description: Update the 'Final URL' field for the ad with the new landing page address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully changes the destination URL.

tasks.description: Save the ad, which may trigger a re-review by the platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: The ad is saved with the new URL.
